Monster Farm 4 Goes PS2 the Best!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Monster Farm 4 Goes PS2 the Best!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, February 25, 2004 - 01:43 pm:

Tomorrow, Monster Farm 4 (presumably with the bug fixed) goes on sale as one of the "Playstation 2 the Best" titles (Japan's version of Greatest Hits). Unlike the US, where sales have never warranted a Greatest Hits release, several MR titles have been "Playstation the Best" in the past. MF4 will be the first "PS2 the Best" title in the series.

Anyway, this is good news all around. Hopefully Japanese gamers will buy the game, and be able to finish it, and sales will continue to climb, insuring future MR games for all of us.

By torey luvullo on Wednesday, February 25, 2004 - 02:46 pm:

i assume that they have fixed the bug for this re-release...

By CHB on Wednesday, February 25, 2004 - 05:58 pm:

The bug is the one where you beat the game, it is impossible to reload that save, right?

Either way, good to hear that a MR5 might be in the distant future, but the glimmer is there.
